column4: is there any time-limit by default in ssh sessions for ubuntu? if an user logs in via ssh and does not type anything for some time... it gets disconnected or what ?
is there any time-limit by default in ssh sessions for ubuntu? if an user logs in via ssh and does not type anything for some time... it gets disconnected or what ?
IdleTimeout time is an sshd variable, not sure what it's set to by default.
